overview: In the concluding chapter of the 'Chinese Unicorn' Saga, Saloona Fishpaste and The Book Man team up to find her beloved Salmon Glass. But with Brad Stan and the Company lurking, what are the chances he is even alive? Or that any of them will escape the encounter with the mysterious businessman?
tagline: The Hunt for Salmon Glass Concludes
title: Chinese Unicorn 4: Shadow Play - Part 2
